content:
I rendered a short video of the clippy repo git history :D
https://ufile.io/ogbl7juf
Unfortunately the vid got a bit bigger than expected (~400 MB for 2m 18s) but it's 1080p 60fps with almost no artifacts :sweat_smile:

If you know some better account-less filehoster let me know! (url should expire in 30 days)
ah yes, and this is the program that does the visualisation :) https://github.com/acaudwell/gource
